pattern.title: Element type not in the XML or XML Schema namespace

assert.test: for $type-qname in resolve-QName(@type, .) return $type-qname = xs:QName('xs:anySimpleType') or namespace-uri-from-QName($type-qname) != xs:anyURI('http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema')

rule.assert: Rule 9-14: An element type MUST NOT be in the XML Schema namespace or the XML namespace.
